response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task goal is to put a board on the floor. From the observed objects, we can see that there is a board (board_275) within reach (1.53m away). The board currently has a leaf (leaf_276) on top of it. To put the board on the floor, we first need to remove the leaf from the board.
response.subtask:
(1) Grasp the leaf from the board.
(2) Put the leaf on the floor.
(3) Grasp the board.
(4) Put the board on the floor.
response.code:
